Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Lugensin A (antimicrobial protein; natural AMPs; insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)

Literature.Author: Zhou X, Peng LY, Wang ZC, Wang W, Zhu Z, Huang XH, Chen LB, Song QS, Bao YY.2019
Literature.Reference: Insect Biochem Mol Biol. 2019 Oct;113:103215. doi: 10.1016/j.ibmb.2019.103215.PubMed
Literature.Title: Identification of novel antimicrobial peptides from rice planthopper, Nilaparvata lugens

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is most similar (23.1%) toCATH_BRALE. GRAVY: -1.29; Mol Wt: 13476.956; Mol formula: C583H915N197O167S1; mol ex coeff of the peptide: 20040. Inhibition zone: The recombinant Lugensin A  showed antibacterial activities against E. coli K12 (16 mm), B. subtilis  (~20 mm) and Aaa RS-1 (~20 mm) at 2 mg/ml. Edited 7/2021
